host

Class HostInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • host.HostInterface

  • public class HostInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the jpanels being displayed and all the data for the host. The host interface keeps track of all of the tables in the restaurant.
    Author:
    cms549

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Table> allTables
      Hash map links integer (table #) to its table object - holds all the tables in the restaurant
      HostMessageSender sender
      Used to send messages to message controller
